article.description: Derrick Strings came off the bench to score a career-high 17 points, leading four UC Irvine players in double figures in a 77-56 victory over winless Marist.
article.headline: Balanced attack leads UC Irvine past Marist
article.linkText: Balanced attack leads UC Irvine past Marist
article.story: POUGHKEEPSIE, N.Y. -- Derrick Strings came off the bench to score a career-high 17 points, leading four UC Irvine players in double figures in a 77-56 victory over winless Marist on Saturday night. The Anteaters (3-3) cruised to a 32-20 halftime advantage and led by as many as 24 in the second half. Darren Moore had 15 points and four steals, Patrick Rembert scored 12 points and Pavol Losonsky chipped in 11 for UC Irvine, which shot 45.3 percent (24 of 53) from the field. The Red Foxes (0-6), playing their first home game of the year, still couldn't get into the win column in a return game of last season's ESPNU BracketBusters contest, which UC Irvine won 66-65. The Anteaters made 21 of 30 free throws, including 16 of 23 in the second half, to pull away. UC Irvine also had a 40-33 rebounding advantage. Anell Alexis and Jay Bowie led Marist with 13 points apiece and Candon Rusin had 11.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
